title: Legend Bowl Directly Download
description:
Legend Bowl brings you back to the glory days of pixel style football games of the past Enjoy a hybrid of arcade-style football and simulation aspects on and off the field. Fully customize players and teams to create an endless amount of variety in your league. Sim-based controls with challenging gameplay mechanics bring the fight to your doorstep! Legend Bowl includes Exhibition Mode, Tournament Mode, Franchise Mode, Training Camp Mode, and a boat load of customization options. Knight Crawlers
Play an exhibition match with any of the 32 teams in the league. Here you can pick up and play against the computer or a friend to see who can beat each other and get all the bragging rights Select your favorite team and play through an infinite number of seasons to see if you can win the Legend Bowl You’ll start off by selecting your favorite team and creating your very own coach or choose from an existing coach from the league. From there you’ll play a full 17 week schedule, complete with player wire events, player and team stats, weekly wrap up news, and more to keep you engaged along the way.
Player traits are a major factor in how they play each week and you’ll have to manage the chemistry of your team to keep you in the winner’s circle. There’s also a complete off season where you’ll take your team through retirements, free agency, player progression, and a full 7 round draft. The goal is to have a deep and immersive Franchise mode where you can have endless hours of fun and challenge Take your team through a bracket style tournament tree to see if you can become a legendary squad! There are 16 teams in total and you must beat your bracket each week to get to the final championship game. Do you have what it takes to win it all? Take on special drills to earn unlockable items and practice until your thumbs get sore This mode is a sandbox where you can hone in on your skills and practice plays with your favorite teams.

system_requirements.OS: Windows XP (SP3), Windows Vista (SP2), Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
